tasks.label: Build BACnet-Tools
tasks.command: taskkill /IM BACnet-Tools.exe /F /FI STATUS eq RUNNING && py -m PyInstaller --name BACnet-Tools --onefile --windowed --add-data bin;bin main_app.py && copy /Y dist\BACnet-Tools.exe C:\Users\wchrestay\Box\Share\Software\ && C:\Users\wchrestay\Box\Share\Software\BACnet-Tools.exe
